group_1.narration: What I found, while cleaning my room, was something I@used to wear almost every single day.@My old high school uniform.
It hasn't been that long since I graduated, but somehow,@seeing my old uniform set aside so neatly...@It felt as if it wasn't mine anymore.
But without a doubt, this is mine.
Just looking at it is nostalgic.@When I close my eyes, I'm flooded with@fond memories of the Mikazuki Manor.
That's right - back then...@Mifuyu was always by my side.

group_1.textRight: Yachan, I could really go for some tea right now~!
But sitting under the kotatsu feels so good,@I can't get up.

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, you start acting so spoiled as soon as you@step inside this house...

group_1.textRight: [chara:100602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you very much!@Yachiyo[chara:100602:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100602:lipSynch_1]-mom.
Yachiyo, you...
You look better in casual clothes.
You look mature, kind of like an office lady...
Nn, sorry, forget it.

group_1.narration: T-that's right,@and Mel was there too...

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo-senpai!!
According to my fortune-telling, Yachiyo-sempai@must remove her uniform!
It was so strange!
But it's just that even though you're a high school student, you don't feel like a high school student!
So when I looked into it with my fortune-telling,@I saw that your compatibility was awful!
A complete mismatch!@Look! The reversed tower!
[chara:303701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eeeek!

group_1.textCenter: Hold on... This is strange...@I can't think of any good memories...
No, it's just a coincidence...!@I just happened to remember some bad ones!
Really, it was just by chance that only bad memories came to me!

group_1.narration: That's right, back then@I still got along with Momoko.

group_1.textLeft: Woah, [chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_200][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]you really give off a different impression@when you're put in a magazine.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you have a totally different vibe when you're@here in school.

group_1.textLeft: Well, there is special lighting for photography, along with the makeup.
So it's natural that it would feel a bit different,@isn't it?

group_1.textRight: No, I think it's just the uniform...?
It's like seeing a high schooler carry an elementary-school backpack.

group_1.textCenter: Another bad memory was about to ruin my mood...
An office lady... Awful compatibility... A high schooler with an elementary-school backpack...

group_1.textRight: I'm home~!

group_1.textCenter: (Ah, I don't have time to change...!)

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo, I'm ho-

Wow, Yachiyo!@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_1][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1][chara:100101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]That uniform looks so good on you!

group_1.textLeft: I just happened to find it while I was cleaning up my bedroom...

group_1.textRight: Hehe - I wish we could have worn the same uniform@and really gone to school together.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes, I suppose...@[chara:100204:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100204:cheek_1][chara:100204:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100204:lipSynch_1]But does this really look alright on me...?

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.narration: When I think back on it,@this uniform carries a lot of bitter memories.
But I think today soothed them quite a bit.
